sourcesContent:
import React, { FunctionComponent } from 'react'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { Button, Row, Col, ListGroup, Image, Card } from 'react-bootstrap'; import { useDispatch, useSelector } from 'react-redux'; import Message from '../components/Message'; import CheckoutSteps from '../components/CheckoutSteps'; interface Props {} const PlaceOrderScreen: FunctionComponent = () => { const cart = useSelector((state: any) => state.cart); cart.itemsPrice = cart.cartItems.reduce((acc: any, item: any) => acc + item.price * item.qty, 0); cart.shippingPrice = cart.itemsPrice > 100 ? 0 : 100; cart.taxPrice = Number((0.15 * cart.itemsPrice).toFixed(2)) const placeOrderHandler = () => {}; return ( <>

Shipping

Address: {cart.shippingAddress?.address},{cart.shippingAddress?.city} {cart.shippingAddress?.postalCode},{' '} {cart.shippingAddress?.country}

Payment Method

Method: {cart.paymentMethod}

Order Items

Method: {!cart.cartItems.length ? ( Your cart is empty ) : ( {cart.cartItems.map((item: any, index: number) => ( {item.name} {item.qty} x ${item.price} = ${item.qty * item.price} ))} )}

Order Summary

 Items ${cart.itemsPrice} Shipping ${cart.shippingPrice} Tax ${cart.taxPrice} Total ${cart.totalPrice} ); }; export default PlaceOrderScreen;
